Class ICrashAdminGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.abstractgui.AbstractGUIController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasTables

    public class ICrashAdminGUIController
extends AbstractAuthGUIController
    The Class ICrashGUIController, which deals with handling the GUI and it's functions for the Administrator.
